translation: By these evil deeds of the destroyers of the family, which cause confusion of castes, the eternal religious rites of the caste and the family are destroyed.
commentary: 1.43 by faults by evil deeds? by these (by) these? of the family destroyers? causing intermingling of castes by the causes of caste hybridization? are destroyed are destroyed? caste religions religious rites of the caste? Family religious rites? f and? eternal: eternal.No Commentary.
